channel.title: Run Problem [PLEASE HELP]
channel.description: [b]After I compiled my server, I went to run my server.. and then it showed this and it won't let me go on..[/b] [code=smarty]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2460) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:556) at server.main(server.java:115)[/code] [size=26pt]What should i do?[/size]

item.title: Run Problem [PLEASE HELP]
item.dc:creator: @3_Days_Grace 3 Days Grace
item.description:
@3_Days_Grace wrote:

jose3121:

You’ve made a error in the shops next time you code shops make a backup go back to what you coded in shops and delete or modify it btw use the “tab” button in the shops not the space.

No, i didn’t…
I did the NPCDrops.cfg nothing with the shops

Read full topic

item.title: Run Problem [PLEASE HELP]

@jose3121 wrote:

item.title: Run Problem [PLEASE HELP]
item.dc:creator: @3_Days_Grace 3 Days Grace
item.description:
@3_Days_Grace wrote:

After I compiled my server, I went to run my server… and then it showed this and it won’t let me go on…

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2460) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:556) at server.main(server.java:115)
[size=26pt]What should i do?[/size]

Read full topic
